pkgmetadata.longdescription: =====unify=====.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/myint/unify.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/myint/unify :alt: Build statusModifies strings to all use the same quote where possible.Example=======After running:: $ unify --in-place example.pythis code.. code-block:: python x = "abc" y = 'hello'gets formatted into this.. code-block:: python x = 'abc' y = 'hello'
